donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
US Department of State, Office to monitor & combat Tracking in persons.
outputs.output_descr: The Programme is broadly  divided into two outcomes, of which the first outlines strategic policy measures to enable the Iraqi Government compliance with UNCAC, while the second one targets interventions in the Regions and Governorates to effectively combat corruption at multiple administrative and geographical levels.

project_descr: Implementing the United Nations Convention against Corruption (UNCAC) and combating corruption at the Governerate level
project_title: Implementing the UN Convention against Corruption
